description: Valentine's Day scavenger hunt recreating 14 years of relationship history

stories.title: Initialize Next.js 16 project with HeroUI + Tailwind
stories.description: Create Next.js 16 project with App Router, install HeroUI, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript. Configure basic project structure.

stories.title: Implement Lisa Frank Noir color system and glassmorphism
stories.description: Create CSS file with color tokens (void-black, neon-magenta, lisa-frank-purple, solar-flare-gold, acid-yellow). Add glassmorphism styles for cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Color tokens defined as CSS variables

stories.title: Create timeline dashboard with 15 stage cards
stories.description: Build main page.tsx with scrolling timeline. Create StageCard component showing id, title, location, time, status.

stories.title: Build status chip component (Locked/Active/Completed)
stories.description: Create status chip using HeroUI Chip component. Colors: Grey (Locked), Gold (Active), Purple (Completed).

stories.title: Implement localStorage progress tracking
stories.description: Create storage.ts utility to save/load stage completion state. Progress survives page refresh.

stories.title: Implement GPS tracking hook with accuracy fallback
stories.description: Create useGPSTracking hook using Geolocation API. Track position, accuracy, and calculate distance to target.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows loading state while acquiring position

stories.title: Build sequential unlock logic (Stage N+1 unlocks when Stage N completes)
stories.description: Implement logic: Stage 1 starts unlocked. Completing Stage N unlocks Stage N+1. All others locked.
acceptanceCriteria: Completing a stage unlocks next stage

stories.title: Build proximity unlock logic (15-meter radius + manual override)
stories.description: For GPS-unlocked stages: check if within radius. Add manual override button (dev only) to bypass GPS.
acceptanceCriteria: Manual override button (only in dev mode)

stories.title: Create 3-level progressive hint system (subtle → clear → obvious)
stories.description: Add hint component that reveals 3 hints sequentially. Each hint is more explicit.
acceptanceCriteria: Cannot skip ahead (must request in order)
Visual styling matches Lisa Frank Noir

stories.title: Add mock GPS mode (?mock=true) and admin unlock for testing
stories.description: Add URL param ?mock=true to simulate GPS at each stage location. Add admin panel to unlock any stage.
acceptanceCriteria: Mock mode simulates GPS at stage locations
Can unlock/lock any stage from admin

stories.title: Create radio frequency slider puzzle (Stage 03)
stories.description: Build interactive slider that plays audio at different frequencies. Correct frequency unlocks stage.

stories.title: Build coordinate input validator (Stage 11)
stories.description: Create input field for GPS coordinates. Validates format and checks if coordinates match target.
acceptanceCriteria: Checks if coordinates match target (within tolerance)

stories.title: Add countdown timer component for time-based stages
stories.description: Create timer that counts down to a target time. Used for stages with specific timing.
acceptanceCriteria: Can configure target time per stage

stories.title: Implement 'Scan' placeholder button (simulates AR)
stories.description: Create button labeled 'Scan' that simulates AR scanning. Shows animation then unlocks stage.
acceptanceCriteria: Visual feedback matches Lisa Frank Noir

epics.title: Stage Content & Polish
epics.description: Populate all 15 stages with clues, narrative, and final testing

stories.title: Research and document GPS coordinates for all 8 locations
stories.description: Look up GPS coordinates for: Home, Sleepy Bee, Covington, Art Museum, The Landing, Art of the Brick, Krohn Conservatory, Nicola's. Document in stages.ts.

stories.title: Add all stage data (coordinates, clues, narrative text, 3 hints per stage)
stories.description: Populate stages.ts with complete data for all 15 stages. Include clues, descriptions, unlock types, and 3 hints each.

stories.title: Record/add audio for radio puzzle (Stage 03)
stories.description: Create or find audio file for radio frequency puzzle. Add to public/audio/. Integrate with RadioPuzzle component.

stories.title: Implement Safe House pause mechanism (Stage 11, 5:00 PM)
stories.description: Stage 11 locks until 5:00 PM. Show countdown timer. Cannot proceed until time is reached.

stories.title: Add stage transition animations
stories.description: Add smooth transitions when unlocking stages and navigating between stages.
acceptanceCriteria: Unlock animation plays when stage unlocked
Animations match Lisa Frank Noir aesthetic

stories.title: Final testing walkthrough using mock mode
stories.description: Complete full playthrough in mock GPS mode. Test all 15 stages, puzzles, hints, and unlocks.
acceptanceCriteria: All 15 stages tested in mock mode

stories.title: Field test GPS accuracy at 2-3 real locations
stories.description: Drive to 2-3 actual locations and test GPS triggering. Adjust unlock radiuses if needed.
acceptanceCriteria: GPS triggers work at correct distance
Accuracy is acceptable in the field
Tested on actual phone (not just desktop)

stories.title: Deploy to Vercel, test on your wife's phone
stories.description: Deploy to Vercel. Install PWA on her phone (without her knowing content). Test installation and basic functionality.
acceptanceCriteria: Basic functionality works on target device

stories.title: Create printable backup clues (in case of tech issues)
stories.description: Create PDF with all clues and solutions. Print as backup in case phone dies or GPS fails.
